name: Endless Scrap
description:
Credits: 
Developer: Tyler Page (https://tylr.itch.io/)
Art: https://zirok.itch.io/
Music: https://yokaiprod.itch.io/
Robots were imported from an asset pack

Create buildings with scrap to destroy robots. Once the robots destroy your water supply you will get scrap for each robot killed to build more defenses. To submit your score press the green "Submit Scrap" button when in build mode (available after the first round). You will forfeit all your scrap and submit it to the leaderboard. Gather up as much scrap as you can before submitting to get on the top 10 page!

Controls:
Right-click to cancel a building
Scroll wheel to zoom
Shift + left click to move the camera
Space to start the wave
Tip: You can click and drag to place multiple barricades or 1x1 turrets
